title: No Fixed Address: on tour
creator_credit: Media World Productions, Channel 0-28, John Tatoulis and Colin South
brief_description: Documentary on the British tour of one of Australia’s leading rock bands, No Fixed Address, a band committed to expressing aspects of their culture and the condition of Aboriginal people through their music. Includes footage of the Brisbane Commonwealth Games protests and also examines British black music.
creator_credit_for_label: Media World Productions, Channel 0-28, John Tatoulis and Colin South
